cab.content: From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State- for India,22nd November 1919.(Repeated to Constantinople, Vladiuostock, and Kashgar under No. 78205.)(Received 25th.)15734. 22nd November. Wire from Malleson dated 10th November, statesReported from Tashkend that recently Lenin despatched 23 German orientalists fromMoscow to spread Bolshevic propaganda throughout Asia. Following are theirdestinations, and report states they will travel as pilgrims or tramps. Japan 4,China 8, Turkestan 2, Persia 3, Afghanistan 2, India 4. Malleson repeated above(? to) Baghdad, Tehran.
